entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Poor codegen for "big" (> 4 fields) structs init #71565
  • [Feature Request] Faster histogram aggregation for the MetricsEventSource #71563
    8.0.0
  • Building CLR with macOS 13 SDK beta does not succeed #71561
  • required and GenerateReferenceAssemblySource #71559
  • Crossgen2 should publish with NativeAOT at the beginning of the build #71557
    7.0.0
  • VS2022 Blazor Debugger doesn't show the generic types in a method #71553
  • VS2022 Blazor debugger can't read a long string from a variable #71552
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient throws an exception or deadlocks when server closes the connection #71549
  • System.Text.Json source generator failes if type to serialize is named `Options` #71547
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Reloc is not used in Tier1 for this simple snippet #71545
    8.0.0
  • JIT ARM32: Assertion failed 'varDsc->lvRefCnt() == 0' during 'Generate code' #71543
    8.0.0
  • Investigate the heuristics for creating DummyDef in LSRA #71539
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Enable UnmanagedCallersOnlyTest tests for the supported features in Mono AOT #71537
  • Remove UnmanagedCallersOnly_MonoAotTest from runtime tests #71532
    7.0.0
  • IOC scope validation design philosophy #71550
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.ConstructorTests_Default_String.MultipleThreadsLooping #71520
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\OSR\\tailpgo\\tailpgo.cmd #71519
  • QUIC: Port 50019 throws QUIC_STATUS_ADDRESS_IN_USE #71518
  • [API Proposal]: `ProcessStartInfo.CreationFlags` (for Windows only) #71515

Closed

  • Include runtime flavor and platform information into .mibc Profile #71065
    7.0.0
  • Unable to build, missing System.IO.Pipes.AccessControl #69826
  • Infra issue (deadletter) in CI `runtime-staging (Build Browser wasm release Browser_wasm_Windows)` in 6.0 #67058
  • Test failure SelfContained_NetCoreApp3_CompatMode_SingleFile_APITests #60849
  • [Nethost/Hostfxr] Hosting: How to get runtime to probe application folder #61059
  • dyld: lazy symbol binding failed: Symbol not found: ____chkstk_darwin Referenced from: /usr/local/share/dotnet/dotnet (which was built for Mac OS X 10.15) Expected in: /usr/lib/libSystem.B.dylib #61085
  • Guard against partial cleanup of extracted files issue is happening again #61936
  • Single file executable still generates DLL file #68526
  • Proposal: Add Static Library Support #68761
  • Loading .NET host via hostfxr process crashes with Fatal error. Failed to load JIT compiler #66475
    Future
  • Repo requires .NET 7 Preview 5 #70799
    7.0.0
  • TaskCompletionSource with TaskCreationOptions.RunContinuationsAsynchronously runs synchronously #71556
  • System.Resources.Extensions.DeserializingResourceReader cannot load an assembly if .NET WinForms controls are used inside a C++ app #66799
  • Figure out an alternative to startup hooks for dev-time scenarios such as hot reload #59107
  • [release/5.0] Test failure SatelliteAssembly_CultureSubdirectory #59531
  • Assembly conflicts in dotnet app with plugin support #68762
  • Hostfxr.dll load failure with arm64 app on arm64 Windows 11 host #65263
  • Installation of the .NET 5.0.13 Runtime changes a system information on macOS 12.1 #63938
  • Single-file and self-deployed application encounters "random" System.IO.FileNotFoundException exceptions when loading libraries #64120
  • AsyncTaskMethodBuilder stopping objects being garbage collected due to reference loop #71538
  • [HTTP/3] SNI does not use the Host header value #57169
    7.0.0
  • P/Invoke SetWindowsHookExA not working in PublishSingleFile/self-contained/win-x86 mode #71522
  • Segmentation violation when doing server-side Kerberos authentication on macOS #71463
    7.0.0
  • Potential issues in RegexCache #71476
  • Cannot build runtime on s390x: The "ApiCompatTask" task failed unexpectedly. #68266
    7.0.0
  • Performance implications of StrongBox #71528
  • GZipStream.Read(byte[],int,int) return a Incorrect length. #71517
  • Backport PR failures in github action #69196
    7.0.0
  • ZipArchive permissions on linux #17912
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Debugger not working when managed libraries don't have pdb file #71456
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Various createdump fixes. Smaller MacOS dump size, better logging/stats, misc cleanup, etc. #71569
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add arm64 macOS cross-compilation instructions. #71568
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Updating a few BitConverter APIs to be intrinsic #71567
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce allocation overhead of Enumerable.Order{Descending} #71564
    area-System.Linq
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix debugging when it's using a external library without debug information #71560
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Defer objcopy selection after alt. compiler check #71554
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] JSImport and JSExport code gen #71551
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix some null reference exceptions and improve nullable annotations #71548
    area-System.Security
  • Use ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf in more places #71546
    area-Meta
  • #37093 disable Reciprocal test only for Android x86 #71541
    area-System.Numerics
  • Handle some rare scenarios in local morph #71536
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Removing UnmanagedCallersOnly_MonoAot tests #71535
    area-Interop-mono
  • Add `RequiresAssemblyFiles` onto `Marshal.GetHINSTANCE`. #71531
    area-Single-File
  • Get S.C.Immutable.Tests running with NativeAOT #71527
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement type loader support for thread statics #71524
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP]Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #71516
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Refactor JsonPropertyInfo initialization infrastructure and implement JsonPropertyInfo.AttributeProvider #71514
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] trying to set shouldcontinueonerror=false for wasm jobs in staging/pr #71513
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Improvements to loop hoisting #71504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a config to MIBC format #71359
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Introduce System.Runtime.TieredPGO knob #71438
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Support long pdata unwinding and save_next for floating point regs in ARM64 #69906
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Don't pollute VS Code TS suggestions with node #71540
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Version resilient cross module code compilation and inlining #71271
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix exception message in Activator #71525
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Updating code owners #71562
    area-Meta
  • Throw NullRef in some delegate construction scenarios #71526
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Basic support for stateless linear collection marshalling #71473
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix nullable annotations on new Order{Descending} methods #71542
    area-System.Linq, 7.0.0
  • Fix inlining of ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf #71544
    area-System.Runtime
  • add basic support for SNI different than URI in H3 #71428
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Remove WaitForSuspend and some ordering cleanups. #71511
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • STJ: Add AggressiveInlining to CheckNotDisposed() #71534
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix crash in GSSAPI on macOS #71484
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix a few theoretical issues in Regex.CacheSize #71490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add tests for contract customization per feedback in #70435 #71529
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [custom_attrs] Use the image's ALC instead of the default one (#68266) #70346
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix ordering issue in JSON #71523
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm-mt] Add MessageChannel between browser thread and new pthreads #70908
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix some tests regressed by the aggressive reflection metadata trimming work #71440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable CA1727: Use PascalCase for named placeholders #71444
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm] Clean up debugger tests output #71483
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix get properties from an object of a library without pdb #71505
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete .NET Native leftovers #71474
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix crossgen2 version resilience test #71357
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use llvm-objcopy with StripSymbols=true and clang #71495
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make dotnet-pgo capable of handling dll conflicts by providing deconfliction options #71502
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Unix arm64 atomics #71512
    arch-arm64, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement Tar async APIs #70574
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Run optRedundantBranches twice and try to compute more accurate doms #70907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Added a new method to the GC API to Get the GC Configurations #70514
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #71485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Add support for GetPinnableReference for the new marshaller shapes #71412
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add an ETW event for reporting richer debug information back #71263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consume Roslyn with `ref` fields support #71498
    area-Meta, CoreClr, Mono, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement new QuicException proposal #71432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn. #70911
  • Exposing static bool IsSupported { get; } on Vector<T> and Vector64/128/256<T> #71240
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • ARM64 - Allow double constants to CSE more often #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Various cryptographic allocation improvements #71015
    area-System.Security
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Ensure that CreateChecked, CreateSaturating, and CreateTruncating are publicly exposed #71493
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete dead code from and fix `getSIMDStructFromField` #71226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Log as error in interop generator when method signature is not supported #71477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder should support binding private properties from ba… #71039
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Experiment light self contained test runner(no reflection/comm stack) #71305
    community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix some System.Net.Security tests #71385
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] JSImport, JSExport and related API types for JavaScript interop #71500
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix: using default value for nullable enum parameter throws ArgumentException #71388
    area-System.Reflection
  • Do not spill "mis-sized" struct args passed on stack #71399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Delete the zero-offset field sequence map #71455
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wow, that looks bad! I don't have time at the moment to investigate, but thanks for reporting. I'll try to look at it soon. #26418

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.0 to the current framework #25476
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • upgrade our version of newtonsoft #26288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a notification for the compatibility area #25959

  • Update the target framework for the test projects #25479
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the RIDs target to the latest one #26096
    Area-Infrastructure

    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support file-local types in EE #62334
  • Give a more specific diagnostic when file type collides with non-file type in same file #62333
  • Define meaning of BuckStopsHereBinder.AssociatedSyntaxTree in EE scenarios #62332
  • Some lookup diagnostics may be missed when a file type shadows a non-file type #62331
  • Report escape error for method invocation with ref argument with narrower lifetime than ref struct argument #62327
  • GetAllowedModifiers for record struct should not include 'ref' #62325
  • Diagnostic reported for `scoped` modifier on non-ref struct type should be a warning only #62318
    17.4
  • Roslyn analyzer for adding new public API to the unshipped.txt files only adds it to one #62317

Closed

  • Scrolling Bars in Refactoring Popup Have Wrong Color #61812
    17.3
  • Enhanced `#line` directives should be supported independent of language version #61530
    17.4
  • [API Proposal] Expose KindText in SyntaxNodeOrToken #47247
  • Endless loop in 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal(SyntaxNode, int)' #57343
    17.3
  • `AbstractMatchFolderAndNamespaceDiagnosticAnalyzer` doesn't bail out for `PreferNamespaceAndFolderMatchStructure` #61858
    17.4
  • NullReferenceException on GetChangedRoot call while the xmldoc doesn't mention any exception #45145
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio 2017 (Roslyn 2.X) produce warning for analyzer assembly that targets roslyn 3.X #42538
    Backlog
  • Error list empty -- with steps to reproduce #42573
    17.3
  • SDK Analyzers Configuration Enhancements #49250
    Backlog
  • Re-enable rich nav on PRs once perf issue is fixed #54666
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Infrastructure/build optimizations #62336
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Address prototype comments in file types branch #62335
    Area-Compilers
  • Seeing what breaks #62328
    Area-Compilers
  • REmove use of Lazy in DeclarationTable for rarely used values. #62324
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not look for load/reference directives when there can't be any #62323
    Area-Compilers
  • Skip the balanced switch dispatch optimization for patterns on floating point inputs #62322
    Area-Compilers
  • Test helpers shouldn't escape quotes by default #62321
    Area-Compilers
  • Reuse prior TableEntry values in the increment NodeTable builder if possible. #62320
    Area-Compilers
  • Prefix 'unmerged changes' with 'TODO' #62319
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Track recursive and list patterns for 'unnecessary assignment' analyzer #62313
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • draft #62306
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable updated escape rules if System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeFeature.ByRefFields exists #62304
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Deprecate IDE0043 in favor of CA2241 #62303
    Area-Analyzers, Blocked, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62297
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Update "file types" from main #62300
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62330
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62329
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Run official build post-build steps on VS2022 #62326
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Theme The "Generate Overrides" Dialog #62244
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62316
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62315
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unreachable condition #62305
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Delete some dead code in AbstractCreateServicesOnTextViewConnection #62256
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Walk green-nodes in incremental-generator attribute-finding path #62295
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Cache the hash in compilation options #62289
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62312
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62311
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Respect dotnet_style_namespace_match_folder #62310
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62308
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62307
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62302
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Specify builder capacities in incremental generation to avoid wasted scratch arrays. #62285
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62301
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62299
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62298
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Snippets - Fix option not being tied back to checkbox #62281
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • File types IDE changes #62215
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Make more command handlers synchronous #62086
    Area-IDE
  • All incremental generator perf work #62159
    Area-Compilers
  • Give member refactoring tools consistent field selection #62102
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Use-site errors for unsupported ref fields #62296
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add ErrorFacts.IsBuildOnlyDiagnostic to ensure error list de-duping f… #62237
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Code diagnostic and fix provider for 45832 "Make anonymous function static" #46429
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [EnC] Support more symbol deletes #62151
    Area-Compilers
  • Rules missing documentation #62242
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Fix project based CompletionProvider #61976
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • faster git checkout #62255
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Always clear diagnostics when ending a debug session #62270
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RequestAborted token should stay identical once retrieved #42547
  • System.Text.Json failure to deserialize strongly typed models from string #42545
  • Page Flashing After Initial Load #42544
  • Exception Encountered With Razor Server #42543
  • chinese characters shows ascii code in web page, #42541
  • Unable to access created Subfolder or razor page under page in ASP.NETCore #42540
  • [Blazor] Annotate Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #42533
  • Multiple login page for redirect #42531
    Discussions
  • Blazor: Prerendered HeadContent gets replaced on WASM startup even if it is not changed #42527
  • Single-file components - @css block in .razor #42525
  • LeakTrackingObjectPool does not report leaks because it only throws in Microsoft's own debug builds #42524
  • Analyzer: Detect using Task<T> with RequestDelegate #42523
  • Question: how to bind a Dictionary in an Options class? #42522
  • About Virtualization in blazor vs large collection #42518
  • Blazor Drag and Drop broke between .NET Core 3.0 and .NET 6.0 #42517
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core to default namespaces #42516
  • Illegible text in IIS Express SSL certificate trust prompt #42515
    Discussions
  • Blazor Server AuthenticationStateProvider.AuthenticationStateChanged is not invoked when user logs in/logout #42514
  • SignalR send to all connections by user ID except one. #42513

Closed

  • QuickGrid throws InvalidOperationException when DateTime column has null value #42499
    .NET 7 Planning
  • SPA template issues with Individual authentication when running in production #42072
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
  • Delete deprecated AzureAD identity UI packages #42546
  • Reduce console spew when creating secrets in user-jwts #42542
    area-commandlinetools
  • Yarn Housekeeping for Blazor/JSInterop #42537
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • [Blazor][Prototype] Support state in NavigationManager #42534
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `548b13d` to `96f5142` #42529
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `548b13d` to `96f5142` #42528
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1857175 #42511
    area-mvc, feature-templates

Merged

  • Change QUIC transport to use multiple calls to QuicStream.WriteAsync #42464
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Selenium Upgrade (v`4.3.0`, Chrome `103`) #42535
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • Small test assert changes for flaky tests #42419
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Add use of onelocbuild.yml #42536
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Get rid of the custom QueryStringHelper implementation #42532
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Annotate hosting diagnostic events with DynamicDependency #42512
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Replace old navigation APIs with the existing API equivalents #42526
    area-blazor
  • Remove RequiresUnreferencedCode from low-level endpoint map methods #42519
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • Use AddAuthentication method instead of property on WAB #42494

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FlexLayout doesn't respect Padding #8483
  • RadioButton with ControlTemplate in a Grid can't change from invisible to visible #8482
  • Setting Border.StrokeShape ignores initial StrokeThickness value #8481
  • Clearing Border.StrokeShape throws an exception #8479
  • AllowExternalDrop should default to false on the Blazor WebView controls (Maui,Wpf,WinForms) #8478
  • Flyout item layout broken on Mac Catalyst #8477
  • Creating a new MAUI App project and naming it "MauiApp" fils to compile #8474
  • Tab key doesn't move between Entry fields on Mac Catalyst #8473
  • .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid Windows platform: BlazorWevView component not shown when nested in VerticalStackLayout or StackLayout #8472
  • Button - Pressed VisualState not setting ImageSource or Custom Properties #8471
  • CollectionView Control not working properly in .Net MAUI #8470
  • Debug on 'Local iOS Device' fails with ApplicationVerificationFailed | 0xE8008015 #8469
  • iOS build does not respect link flags like <AdditionalArgs>-gcc_flags "-framework CoreMIDI"</AdditionalArgs> #8468
  • Button ContentLayout iOS ignores spacing and aligns to edge of button #8467
  • AppDomain.CurrentDomain.UnhandledException is not invoked on iOS #8463
  • How does MAUI apply implicit style? #8460
  • Can't change ImageSource on Button on Android #8459
  • BlazorWebView - grey screen on one machine #8461
  • .NET MAUI Blazor NavigationManager may not work correctly on Windows #8458

PullRequests

Created

  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md #8475

Merged

  • Bump GitInfo from 2.1.2 to 2.2.0 #8441
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.2.1.6 to 1.2.1.7 #7852

  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.4.2 to 2.4.2.1 #7851

Updated

    7.0.0

Merged
